page.name: Pure Pool Prod
page.description: The wielder of this staff is said to have the power to control the tides of very small ponds. It's not a GREAT power but it's better than nothing.

properties.name: Pure Pool Prod
properties.description: The wielder of this staff is said to have the power to control the tides of very small ponds. It's not a GREAT power but it's better than nothing.

page.name: The Pure Pool
page.description: In order to stop the river of fire, Warlic requires a sample of pure elemental water from the Pure Pool. He said that the best sample would come from where the waterfall feeds into the pool.

properties.name: The Pure Pool
properties.description: In order to stop the river of fire, Warlic requires a sample of pure elemental water from the Pure Pool. He said that the best sample would come from where the waterfall feeds into the pool.
properties.complete: Splashy, the Pure Pool's guardian, lies defeated at your feet and you can feel your toes squishing inside your socks. You have gotten the water sample from the purest part of the pure pool. Now Warlic can change the river of fire back to water.
